# Interface ImageUrlInterface

Represents an image URL with detail level specification.

interface ImageUrlInterface {  
detail?: string;  
url: string;  
}

##### Index

### Properties

detail? url

## Properties

### `Optional`detail

detail?: string

Specifies the detail level of the image: 'low', 'high', 'auto'. Defaults to 'auto'.

### url

url: string

The URL of the image.

### Settings

Member Visibility

  * Protected
  * Inherited
  * External
